about.introduction: My name is Andrew Quan. I'm a full-time student at Pasadena City College. I'm always interested in trying out new gadgets and emerging technologies. At my leisure, I like to work with computers, whether it be hardware or software. I also like to meet new people who are passionate about the things that I also enjoy doing.

career.title: Community College
career.description: I will be graduating from Pasadena City College and will be obtaining an Associate of Science in Mathematics.

career.title: University
career.description: I will be attending a university and majoring in Computer Science.
